meanings.sent1: She is the lovier of the two sisters.
meanings.sent2: The sunset was even lovier than the sunrise.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's attempt at singing was lovier than his howling.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the lovier side of the moon.
meanings.sent5: The garden in spring is lovier than a dream.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is more lovely.
meanings.sent1: She is the lovier in the painting.
meanings.sent2: The lovier in the room caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The lovier at the party was the shy cat in the corner.
meanings.sent4: The lovier in the garden was the blooming rose.
meanings.sent5: The lovier in the story was the kind-hearted princess.
